Author: aetolica
Text: You might try just telling him :) I am very open about my disorder (possibly TOO open) and have found a few important things: 1. Most people don't give a shit. 2. People back off when you explain.  3. It's nice not to lie every waking moment. 4. People who do give a shit? Not worth your time anyway.

Author: lipstickwoes
Text: Can you suggest doing something else instead? Like, instead of declining altogether, ask if he can walk with you to your next class, or set up a time to study together, or go check out a cool local place.
